nodes.text: The Vigilant was a male Flesh Raider from the planet Tython that had been biologically altered to become the living security system for CZ-198, a research facility for Czerka Corporation, at the orders of Special Executive Rasmus Blys. Grown to over half a dozen meters tall and given extensive cybernetic enhancements, including hardwiring its brain into the security systems of CZ-198, the Vigilant was installed as the facility's protector. However, the Vigilant was ultimately killed during an incursion into the facility as CZ-198's power core threatened to explode.
